1 /**
  2  * Created by romans on 9/15/15.
  3  */
  4 /**
  5  * Kaazing JavaScript Universal Client facade that communicates with the gateway based on specified protocol. Script downloads necessary libraries except of JmsClient.js - that script has to be added to the <head> section.
  6  * @param protocol Specifies protocol that should be used for communications: jms - for communication with Kaazing JMS Gateway, amqp - for communication with Kaazing AMQP Gateway.
  7  * @returns {{UniversalClient object that implements communication functions}}
  8  * @constructor
  9  */
 10 var UniversalClientDef=function(protocol){
 11     /**
 12      * Provides communication services with JMS or AMQP server. Created within UniversalClientDef constructor.
 13      * @class
 14      * @name JavascriptUniversalClient
 15      */
 16     var JavascriptUniversalClient = {};
 17     var client = null;
 18 
 19     /**
 20      * Connects to Kaazing WebSocket Gateway (AMQP or JMS)
 21      * @param url Connection URL
 22      * @param username User name to be used to establish connection
 23      * @param password User password to be used to establish connection
 24      * @param topicP Name of the publishing endpoint - AMQP exchange used for publishing or JMS Topic.
 25      * @param topicS Name of the subscription endpoint - AMQP exchange used for subscription or JMS Topic.
 26      * @param noLocal Flag indicating whether the client wants to receive its own messages (true) or not (false). That flag should be used when publishing and subscription endpoints are the same.
 27      * @param messageDestinationFuncHandle Function that will be used to process received messages from subscription endpoint in a format: function(messageBody)
 28      * @param errorFuncHandle function that is used for error handling in a format of function(error)
 29      * @param loggerFuncHandle function that is used for logging events in a format of function(severity, message)
 30      * @param connectFunctionHandle function this is called when connection is established in a format: function()
 31      */
 32     JavascriptUniversalClient.connect = function (url, username, password, topicP, topicS, noLocal, messageDestinationFuncHandle, errorFuncHandle, loggerFuncHandle, connectFunctionHandle) {
 33         if (client!=null && client.connected)
 34             return;
 35 
 36         var logInformation = function (severity, message) {
 37             if (loggerFuncHandle !== null)
 38                 loggerFuncHandle(severity, message);
 39             if (severity == "INFO") {
 40                 console.info(message);
 41             }
 42             else if (severity == "ERROR") {
 43                 console.error(message);
 44             }
 45             else if (severity == "WARN") {
 46                 console.warn(message);
 47             }
 48             else
 49                 console.trace(message);
 50         }
 51         if (protocol.toLowerCase() === "amqp") {
 52                 requirejs(['bower_components/kaazing-amqp-0-9-1-client-javascript/javascript/WebSocket.js'],function(){
 53                     requirejs(['bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.js','bower_components/kaazing-amqp-0-9-1-client-javascript/javascript/Amqp-0-9-1.js', 'bower_components/kaazing-javascript-universal-client/javascript/src/AmqpUniversalClient.js'], function () {
 54                         console.info("Using AMQP protocol!");
 55                         client = amqpClientFunction(logInformation);
 56                         client.connect(url, username, password, topicP, topicS, noLocal, messageDestinationFuncHandle, errorFuncHandle, loggerFuncHandle, connectFunctionHandle);
 57                     });
 58                 });
 59         }
 60         else if (protocol.toLowerCase() === "jms") {
 61                 requirejs(['bower_components/kaazing-jms-client-javascript/javascript/src/WebSocket.js','bower_components/kaazing-javascript-universal-client/javascript/src/JMSUniversalClient.js'], function () {
 62                 console.info("Using JMS protocol!");
 63                 client = jmsClientFunction(logInformation);
 64                 client.connect(url, username, password, topicP, topicS, noLocal, messageDestinationFuncHandle, errorFuncHandle, loggerFuncHandle, connectFunctionHandle);
 65             });
 66         }
 67         else {
 68             alert("Unsupported protocol " + protocol);
 69         }
 70     }
 71 
 72     /**
 73      * Sends messages to a publishing endpoint.
 74      * @param msg Message to be sent. As messages are sent in a text format msg will be converted to JSON if it is not a string.
 75      */
 76     JavascriptUniversalClient.sendMessage = function (msg) {
 77         client.sendMessage(msg);
 78     }
 79 
 80     /**
 81      * Disconnects from Kaazing WebSocket Gateway
 82      */
 83     JavascriptUniversalClient.disconnect=function(){
 84         client.disconnect();
 85     }
 86 
 87     return JavascriptUniversalClient;
 88 
 89 };
 90
